DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare efficacy AZD6244 ( ARRY-142886 ) temozolomide patient advanced melanoma
DOC.brief_title: Randomised Study Compare Efficacy AZD6244 v TMZ
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed late stage malignant melanoma Aged 18 Female patient must postmenopausal negative urine pregnancy test premenopausal Any previous radiotherapy chemotherapy ( palliative radiotherapy acceptable ) Participation trial investigational product within previous 30 day
